item.description: The unique id of the item that can be dropped.

chance.description: The probability of the item dropping. Should be a decimal between 0 and 1 (inclusive), where 0 is 0% and 1 is 100%. You may use a whole number greater than 1 to have multiple of the same item dropping.

extra_attributes.description: Extra attributes that are passed into the item constructor when it spawns.
